resources.string:
--> The game can be played by single player or two players.

 --> If it is single player then the other player is computer.

 --> There is a 3x3 grid in the game in which player-I places 'X' in the boxes and player-II places 'O' in the boxes.

 --> In each turn player must fill only one box.

 --> The player who first completes a row or column or diagonal first respectively with 'X' or 'O' is the winner of the game.

 --> If no player can achieve a complete row or column or diagonal with 'X' or 'O' then the game is draw.
